## è¦šãˆã¦ãŠãã¹ãã“ã¨

* DOMã«ã¯åž‹éšŽå±¤ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŒã€JavaScriptã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯é€šå¸¸ã¯ç„¡è¦–ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚ã—ã‹ã—ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®åž‹ã¯TypeScriptã§ã¯ã‚ˆã‚Šé‡è¦ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã‚’ç†è§£ã™ã‚Œã°ã€ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ãƒ¼å‘ã‘ã«TypeScriptã‚’æ›¸ãéš›ã«å½¹ç«‹ã¤ã€‚
* `Node`ã€`Element`ã€`HTMLElement`ã€`EventTarget`ã®é•ã„ã‚„ã€`Event`ã¨`MouseEvent`ã®é•ã„ã‚’çŸ¥ã£ã¦ãŠãã€‚
* ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã¯DOMè¦ç´ ã‚„ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ååˆ†å…·ä½“çš„ãªåž‹ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ãã‚Œã‚’æŽ¨è«–ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªæ–‡è„ˆã‚’TypeScriptã«ä¸Žãˆã‚‹ã€‚

## ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰

```js
function handleDrag(eDown) {
  const targetEl = eDown.currentTarget;
  targetEl.classList.add('dragging');
  const dragStart = [eDown.clientX, eDown.clientY];
  const handleUp = (eUp) => {
    targetEl.classList.remove('dragging');
    targetEl.removeEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
    const dragEnd = [eUp.clientX, eUp.clientY];
    console.log('dx, dy = ', [0, 1].map(i => dragEnd[i] - dragStart[i]));
  }
  targetEl.addEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
}
const surfaceEl = document.getElementById('surface');
surfaceEl.addEventListener('mousedown', handleDrag);
```

[ðŸ’» TypeScriptãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰](https://www.typescriptlang.org/ja/play/?ts=5.8.2#)

----

```ts
function handleDrag(eDown: Event) {
  const targetEl = eDown.currentTarget;
  targetEl.classList.add('dragging');
  // ~~~~~           'targetEl' is possibly 'null'
  //                 'targetEl' ã¯ 'null' ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
  //       ~~~~~~~~~ Property 'classList' does not exist on type 'EventTarget'
  //                 ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ 'classList' ã¯åž‹ 'EventTarget' ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
  const dragStart = [
     eDown.clientX, eDown.clientY
     //    ~~~~~~~        ~~~~~~~ Property '...' does not exist on 'Event'
     //                           ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ '...' ã¯åž‹ 'Event' ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
  ];
  const handleUp = (eUp: Event) => {
    targetEl.classList.remove('dragging');
    // ~~~~~           'targetEl' is possibly 'null'
    //                 'targetEl' ã¯ 'null' ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
    //       ~~~~~~~~~ Property 'classList' does not exist on type 'EventTarget'
    //                 ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ 'classList' ã¯åž‹ 'EventTarget' ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
    targetEl.removeEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
    // ~~~~~ 'targetEl' is possibly 'null'
    //       'targetEl' ã¯ 'null' ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
    const dragEnd = [
      eUp.clientX, eUp.clientY
      //  ~~~~~~~      ~~~~~~~   Property '...' does not exist on 'Event'
     //                          ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ '...' ã¯åž‹ 'Event' ã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
    ];
    console.log('dx, dy = ', [0, 1].map(i => dragEnd[i] - dragStart[i]));
  }
  targetEl.addEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
  // ~~~~~ 'targetEl' is possibly 'null'
  //       'targetEl' ã¯ 'null' ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
}

const surfaceEl = document.getElementById('surface');
surfaceEl.addEventListener('mousedown', handleDrag);
// ~~~~~~ 'surfaceEl' is possibly 'null'
//        'surfaceEl' ã¯ 'null' ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
```

const p = document.getElementsByTagName('p')[0];
//    ^? const p: HTMLParagraphElement

//    ^? const button: HTMLButtonElement
const div = document.querySelector('div');
//    ^? const div: HTMLDivElement | null

[ðŸ’» TypeScriptãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰](https://www.typescriptlang.org/ja/play/?ts=5.8.2#code/GYVwdgxgLglg9mABACwIZgCYBsCmARAJ1QHMAKfOAdzAC5EBRANxzCgEpEBvAKEUQHp+iAHSjeiCAgDOURBiLEAylFQFZAXkQBtcX0QVqwiFhgsoADQA0+vFTBGTZgJq6+gvYgB+3n548ffH0QABQI4AAccNQBPRAByUWE4uTgcKUQwOFkcAA8YGUQEeKYzONcBIX8q6prAdYZAW4ZARYZAMYZAYoZ4xOTAewZAaPVi5lZkwGsGQA1tQAp1QHUGQD8GQG0GQGSGQCAGcQBdAG5xd0TuAF8gA)

----

```ts
function addDragHandler(el: HTMLElement) {
  el.addEventListener('mousedown', eDown => {
    const dragStart = [eDown.clientX, eDown.clientY];
    const handleUp = (eUp: MouseEvent) => {
      el.classList.remove('dragging');
      el.removeEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
      const dragEnd = [eUp.clientX, eUp.clientY];
      console.log('dx, dy = ', [0, 1].map(i => dragEnd[i] - dragStart[i]));
    }
    el.addEventListener('mouseup', handleUp);
  });
}

const surfaceEl = document.getElementById('surface');
if (surfaceEl) {
  addDragHandler(surfaceEl);
}
```

[ðŸ’» TypeScriptãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰](https://www.typescriptlang.org/ja/play/?ts=5.8.2#-oyLsyRNcgioQFhgMgIGsSDUjBAQDw+JJcGQoJwRooAELQgCSqG00tl8rIc1yMGAtXNcoVnEEonEMmweEIp00DstztyjKAA)
